docs.lead_paragraph: A former Dallas neurosurgeon has been described by state regulators as so derelict during operations that his actions led to the deaths of two patients and left others with disabling injuries in what's seen as one of the worst recent cases of malpractice in Texas.

headline.main: Indictment: Former Texas Surgeon So Derelict He Left 2 Dead

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Suggests Jeb Bush Has Hurt Black Americans’ Cause

docs.abstract: In a speech in Florida to a largely black audience at the annual meeting of the National Urban League, Hillary Rodham Clinton derided the policies and proposals of Jeb Bush, a former governor of the state.

headline.main: Need a Kidney? Not Iranian? You’ll Wait.

docs.abstract: Iran has a unique and regulated system for paying kidney donors. The system has problems, but letting citizens who need transplants die on waiting lists isn’t one of them.
docs.snippet: Iran has a unique and regulated system for paying kidney donors. The system has problems, but letting citizens who need transplants die on waiting lists isn’t one of them.

docs.lead_paragraph: Republican presidential candidate Jeb Bush went into historically Democratic territory Friday to tell a predominantly African-American audience that the country's decades-long efforts to fight poverty are failing — and his record as Florida governor, especially in education, serves as a blueprint for a future presidency.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Obama administration said on Thursday that many consumers were benefiting from increased competition among insurers under the Affordable Care Act.

headline.main: Increased Competition Kept Lid on Health Insurance Inflation, U.S. Says
headline.print_headline: Health Act Is Credited With Fueling Competition

docs.abstract: Health and Human Services Dept reports that many consumers are benefiting from competition among insurers under Affordable Care Act, which has created greater choice in marketplace; findings are based on study of 35 states.
docs.snippet: The Obama administration said on Thursday that many consumers were benefiting from increased competition among insurers under the Affordable Care Act.

docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Nneka Jones Tapia, a clinical psychologist, was chosen to run Cook County Jail, underscoring how much the nation’s prisons have become holding centers for the mentally ill.

headline.main: A Psychologist as Warden? Jail and Mental Illness Intersect in Chicago
headline.print_headline: Troubled Inmates, and a Psychologist as Warden

docs.abstract: Nneka Jones Tapia, psychologist at Cook County Jail in Illinois, has been appointed institution's executive director, becoming one of first clinical psychologists to run prison; appointment underscores extent to which prisons in United States have become holding pens for mentally ill and raises important issue as nation rethinks its prison system.
docs.snippet: Dr. Nneka Jones Tapia, a clinical psychologist, was chosen to run Cook County Jail, underscoring how much the nation’s prisons have become holding centers for the mentally ill.

docs.lead_paragraph: CVS Health Corp. deliberately overcharged some pharmacy customers for generic drugs by submitting claims to their insurance companies at inflated prices, according to a lawsuit filed Thursday in federal court in San Francisco.

headline.main: Lawsuit Accuses CVS of Overcharging for Generic Drugs
headline.print_headline: Lawsuit Accuses CVS of Overcharging for Generic Drugs

docs.snippet: CVS Health Corp. deliberately overcharged some pharmacy customers for generic drugs by submitting claims to their insurance companies at inflated prices, according to a lawsuit filed Thursday in federal court in San Francisco.

docs.lead_paragraph: An evangelical Christian college in Illinois will stop providing health insurance to students on Friday because of its objection to the Obamacare mandate to provide contraceptive coverage, a legal group representing the school said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Illinois College to Drop Health Coverage Over Contraception Mandate
